Class AttackBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.attribute.AttackBonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevelUp

    public class AttackBonus
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILevelUp
    This class is used to compute attack bonus of the character in each combat.
